name: Rockhopper (Lone Buoy Games)
description:
Lone Buoy Games at Drexel University presents: Rockhopper! Make a splash in a fun 3D adventure game starring delightful penguins, frightening whirlpools, and fish galore! Rockhopper sets sail immediately after the Westphal College Senior Showcase 2021.

https://lonebuoygames.wordpress.com/

Keyboard / Mouse Controls:

MovementWASD keysJumpSpacebarInteract / CancelE keyRotate Camera
Move mouseEquip fishing rodR keyAim rodRight mouse buttonCast rodLeft mouse buttonToggle sail on boatQ keyDash on boatLeft ShiftRotate sailsX/C keysPause gameEscape key

Gamepad controls are present as a PNG in the download.

Current upload is Windows-only.
